title: Las Casas on native population - effect

content.question: Which of the following most directly resulted from the change in the Native American population described by Las Casas?

choices.label: The Spanish introduced new crops into the Americas, altering the native diet.
The Spanish imported Africans as a new source of labor.
Laborers on Hispaniola launched a large-scale rebellion against their Spanish oppressors.
The remaining native groups established alliances with the Spanish colonists.

content.answer: The Spanish imported Africans as a new source of labor.
